Um, I don’t want to be spoilorific but one of my favourite computer games ever actually does do this: there isn’t a “saving people” or a things getting darker, but you do learn more and more about your character’s backstory as you go and you make a particular assumption about your character’s relationship with a character you never meet, and right at the very end of the game you do meet and realize that the relationship you have isn’t the one you think you have, in a way that makes you that character’s villain. If you don’t mind having this game spoiled for you, drop me a message and I’ll tell you.
